name: Toad in the Hole
description:
Toad in the Hole

A game made for Ludum Dare 48 in 72 hours with my fiance.

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move, E to Talk/ Croak, Space to Jump!

Also supports controller.

If you're having audio issues in a web browser, I reccomend downloading the executable.

Owen Lyons - Code, Level Design, Art

Sam Hall - Writing, Concept, Direction
